ing: 2 slices canned jalapeno pepper, finely chopped
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
des: "My family loves the salsa from Carlos O'Kelly's. This is as close as I can come and it is delicious! You can add anything to this salsa, we've added different peppers or more garlic. It's always good."
ins: Mix tomatoes, scallions, garlic, and jalapeno pepper together in a bowl. Drizzle lime juice over mixture and add cilantro, onion salt, and salt; mix well.
